entry.title: MLOps Model Serving Architecture with BentoML

Description

I'm going to summarize the outline of Model Serving, one of the fields of MLOps. I'll explain what to do in the field of Model Serving through a framework called BentoML.

Model Serving Framework: BentoML, torchserve, tenrsorflowserving, triton-inference-server Model Serving Platform â€¦
entry.content:
Description

I'm going to summarize the outline of Model Serving, one of the fields of MLOps. I'll explain what to do in the field of Model Serving through a framework called BentoML.

This session covers the following two major topics.

Model Serving Framework: BentoML, torchserve, tenrsorflowserving, triton-inference-server Model Serving Platform: kserve, yatai, sagemaker (deploy part)

I'll mainly show examples through BentoML and compare other frameworks.

Kim Seong-ryeol I'm working on Serving in the Naver Biz CIC advertising recommendation section.
